meanings.sent1: The artist created a colorful blob on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The blob of clay was easy to mold into different shapes.
meanings.sent3: The blob of jelly wiggled on the plate, making everyone laugh.

meanings.definition: A drop of a thick liquid
meanings.sent1: She added a blob of ketchup to her fries.
meanings.sent2: The blob of honey slowly dripped from the spoon.
meanings.sent3: The blob of chocolate syrup made the dessert extra sweet.
meanings.sent4: The blob of melted butter glistened on the hot pancake.
meanings.sent5: A blob of glue secured the pieces together.

meanings.definition: To make or mark with blobs
meanings.sent1: She carefully blobbed the paint onto the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The child blobbed the paper with colorful markers.
meanings.sent3: He blobbed the wall with different shades of blue.
meanings.sent4: The artist blobbed the sculpture with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent5: They blobbed the fabric with dye to create a unique design.
